heading: Choctaw language materials.
general-note: Here are entered works written in Choctaw intended primarily for general information or recreational reading. Such works with text also given in English are further subdivided by the subdivision. Bilingual,. i.e.. Choctaw language materials--Bilingual.. Reading texts in Choctaw containing material for instruction and practice in reading that language are entered under. Choctaw language--Readers..
